concept.title: Using TDes8Overflow
concept.shortdesc: Use TDes8Overflow to handle overflow issues when calling theTDes8::AppendFormat() function.

conbody.p: The Overflow() member function of the overflow handler, TDes8Overflow, can be defined and implemented to handle a potential descriptor overflow resulting from a call to TDes8::AppendFormat().
There are many actions that the overflow function can perform but some possibilities are:

li.p: just return - in effect, this suppresses the panic caused by the overflow.
replace the entire string with some error indication, e.g. "Overflowed"

conbody.p: For more complex recovery actions, it may be easier to set a flag in the implementation of the TDes8Overflow class and check it on return from the call to AppendFormat().
